title: AI in Healthcare Workshop
description: Learn how AI is transforming healthcare with real-world applications. This workshop covers AI techniques used in medical imaging, diagnosis, and patient care.

title: Cybersecurity Panel
description: Join industry experts as they discuss the latest trends in cybersecurity, potential career paths, and how to protect digital assets in a rapidly changing tech landscape.

title: Annual Hackathon 2024
description: Join us for our annual hackathon event where students and professionals collaborate to build innovative projects over a weekend.

title: Women in Tech Networking
description: A networking event for women in tech, where attendees can share experiences, seek mentorship, and explore opportunities in the industry.

title: Tech Resume Workshop
description: A workshop focused on building effective tech resumes and portfolios to help you land your dream job in the technology industry.

title: Programming with Python
description: A hands-on workshop designed to introduce Python programming, covering the basics of syntax, data structures, and problem-solving techniques.
